#include <iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;

long long binarysearch(long long arr[],long long val,int low,int high)
{
    if(high>=low)
    {   long long mid=low +(high-low)/2;
        if(arr[mid]==val)
            return mid;
        else if (arr[mid]>val)
            return binarysearch(arr,val,low,mid-1);
            else
            return binarysearch(arr,val,mid+1,high);
    }
    else return -1;
}
int main()
{
    long long n,flag=0,x,y,z,i;
    long long k;
    scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&k);
    long long arr[n];
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)scanf("%lld",&arr[i]);
    sort(arr,arr+n);
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        y=k-arr[i];
        z=binarysearch(arr,y,i+1,n-1);
        if(z!=-1){flag=1;break;}
    }
    if(flag==0)printf("No\n");else printf("Yes\n");
    return 0;
}
